full_summary:
# High Voltage Infrastructure Electrical Services - Lethbridge Research and Development Centre

## Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Identifier**: 
    *   Title: High Voltage Infrastructure Electrical Services - Lethbridge Research and Development Centre
    *   Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C048
    *   Issue Date: October 10, 2023
    *   Closing Date: November 21, 2023 (12:00 PM MDT)
*   **Procurement Method**:  Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Number of Periods**: 
    *   The contract is for one (1) year with an option to extend for three (3) periods of one (1) year each
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 1, 2023

## Background

The Lethbridge Research and Development Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires a contractor to provide high-voltage electrical infrastructure services on an "as and when requested basis."

## Mandatory Technical Requirements

*   Responding bid must comply with the solicitation requirements and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive
*   Assessment of bids will be conducted according to the entire solicitation including the technical and financial evaluation criteria

## Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents including the RFP, along with the security requirements, instructions, and evaluation criteria are available via GETS. To access the documents go to https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/solicitation-opportunities

## Contact Information

For any information, or clarification, kindly make contact with the Contracting Specialist

## Evaluation Process

The Bids will be assessed on evaluation criteria, which is detailed in the solicitation package, and evaluation rating guidelines. The award for a contract will be made to the responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price 

**Compliance with Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is open to all bidders that comply with the trade agreements of the Government of Canada. This includes the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).
